text: 16|28|tamakkut tame tinkilaittuk konta ivarkalutaiya uyirai vanavarkal kaipparrum polutu (avarkal) ‘‘nankal oru kurramum ceyyavillai'' enru (kurit tankalait tunpurutta ventamena vanavarkalitam) camatanattaik koruvarkal. (Atarku vanavarkal) ‘‘maraka! Niccayamaka allah ninkal ceytu kontiruntavarrai nankarivan'' (enru patilalipparkal)
